title: Stained Glass Window, ca. 1890–1910
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
description: Horizontal panels in white-painted wooden window frames, large orange and red flowers on a dark green ground, set off at each side by a garland of flowers on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stained Glass Window, ca. 1890–1910.
ca. 1890–1910. Glass, lead, wood. Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander. 1907-1-261.
